I was thinking on the matter and thought of something that I wanna 
share.
Since everyone (me and Rauq and people like us mostly) are very busy 
with school up to about half-December, I think that the elections 
should take place around December 20 so the training of the new 
council members gets done now and that we have time to train him (or 
her, of course). 
Also, instead of scheduling the elections every 2 or three months or 
so, I'd like to know what you guys think of a certain number of fixed 
date when there would be elections.
Please let me know your opinions!

By the way, Rudra, can you tell me how many council member we are 
voting for? Is it one or two and is my term over? '~'
